html:
Axiom Cloud Inc, a US-based provider of software and automation solutions, has secured venture funding led by Vela Partners, Lorimer Ventures, and Leadout Capital, Whole Foods.

Axiom Cloud intends to use proceeds to expand its interoperability with new types of facilities

Deal In Brief

Deal TypeVenture Finance
Sub-CategoryStart-up
Deal StatusCompleted: 2021-11-11

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Axiom Cloud Inc.
Acquirer 1 (Company)Whole Foods Market, Inc.
Acquirer 2 (Company)Lorimer Ventures Limited
Acquirer 3 (Company)Leadout Capital
Acquirer 4 (Company)Vela Partners
